content:
You're a true musical theater fan! Yes, there are some fantastic stores in the Theater District where you can find souvenirs, sheet music, and more. Here are a few recommendations:

1. **The Drama Book Shop** (250 W 40th St): A legendary store dedicated to all things theater, with a vast selection of scripts, sheet music, and theater-related books. It's a must-visit for any theater enthusiast! (5-minute walk from Shubert Theatre, 10-minute walk from Winter Garden Theatre)
2. **Theatre Circle** (268 W 44th St): A unique shop offering a wide range of theater-themed items, including souvenirs, apparel, and collectibles. They often feature special items related to current Broadway shows. (2-minute walk from Shubert Theatre, 7-minute walk from Winter Garden Theatre)
3. **One Shubert Alley** (222 W 44th St): Located in the heart of the Theater District, this shop offers a variety of Broadway-themed merchandise, including souvenirs, apparel, and gifts. (1-minute walk from Shubert Theatre, 6-minute walk from Winter Garden Theatre)
4. **Music Theatre International** (423 W 55th St): While not directly in the Theater District, this store is worth a short walk or subway ride. They offer a vast selection of sheet music, vocal scores, and scripts from various musicals, including many Broadway shows. (15-minute walk from Winter Garden Theatre, or take the B, D, F, or M subway train from 42nd Street – Bryant Park to 59th Street – Columbus Circle)

These stores are all within walking distance or a short subway ride from the Winter Garden Theatre and Shubert Theatre. You might also stumble upon some smaller, independent shops or vendors selling theater-themed items in the area.

Remember to check the stores' hours of operation and availability, as they might vary depending on the day and time of year. Happy shopping, and I hope you find some amazing souvenirs and sheet music to commemorate your Broadway adventure!
